titleStmt.title: The bearing and burden of the spirit wherein the sicknesse and soundnesse of the soule is opened, and eight cases of conscience cleared and resolved for the setling and comforting of perplexed consciences / by John Sedgwick ...
titleStmt.author: Sedgwick, John, 1600 or 1601-1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.M. for R. Harford, and are to be sold by H. Blunden at the Castle in Cornehill,
